■Up to 50 nuggets can be lined
up in the 1/2 UHC tray.
■Up to 25 nuggets can be lined
up in the 1/3 UHC tray.

■Move the nuggets to the UHC
tray with a wire rack. Gently
shake the tray to evenly
distribute the nuggets.

■Don't mix new and old nuggets.
■Put the empty basket on top of
the vat to let the remaining
oil drop into it instead of
getting all over the floor.
